levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, prioritize healing the target that has taken the most <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</>. When healing targets with more than 50% Elemental Injury, <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> healed is increased to <@ba.vup>{trait_scale:0%}</>
